name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **React**. Expertise in building scalable applications using modern technologies, including **Flutter**, with a strong proficiency across the full stack utilizing frameworks such as **Next.js**, **Vue**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Demonstrated ability to drive AI and Machine Learning initiatives with comprehensive knowledge in developing ML pipelines and deploying models, leveraging tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

Proficient in employing **Agile** methodologies for project management while maintaining a robust focus on creating secure and compliant solutions aligned with healthcare standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. A strategic thinker with hands-on experience in cloud-native applications deployment on **Azure** and **AWS**, microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, resulting in enhanced operational efficiencies and real-time analytics. Committed to building impactful systems that are technically sound and align with organizational goals.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed full-stack solutions utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js**, ensuring robust performance in healthcare and finance sectors while adhering to best practices and regulatory standards.
•	Executed the design of dynamic frontend interfaces using **React** (versions **17-18**), optimizing user experience and responsiveness for various applications.
•	Led the integration of AI functionalities into applications by employing machine learning techniques for predictive analysis, enhancing the functionality of healthcare and financial dashboards.
•	Applied Agile methodologies to drive project execution and sprint-based development, ensuring timely delivery and alignment with project goals.
•	Collaborated in the implementation of cloud services for application deployment and scalability, focusing on efficient use of resources and service reliability.
•	Implemented IoT-driven solutions to enhance data collection mechanisms in healthcare, enabling real-time monitoring and analysis.
•	Worked on improving application performance through optimization of JavaScript and **Node.js** code, resulting in decreased load times by up to **30%**.
•	Contributed to cross-functional teams with STEM expertise, mentoring junior developers and fostering knowledge sharing across disciplines.
•	Established testing frameworks with tools like Jest and Cypress, increasing code coverage to **95%**, ensuring application stability and reliability in production environments.
•	Transformed data processing pipelines using advanced analytics and visualization tools to facilitate informed decision-making in operational KPIs and fraud detection.

Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to lead the development and modernization of financial platforms, enhancing scalability and maintainability through a microservices-based architecture with **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django).
Developed responsive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, leveraging **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to deliver high-quality user experiences for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Engineered real-time transaction monitoring dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to analyze financial activities and detect anomalies with actionable insights.
Established an event-driven architecture by integrating **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, facilitating asynchronous communication for over **1,000** real-time transactions and alerts per second.
Designed and orchestrated ETL pipelines for financial data ingestion using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, ensuring reliable data flow from over **50** internal and third-party sources in both batch and real-time modes.
Implemented fraud detection algorithms using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing patterns to proactively identify suspicious activities, improving detection efficiency by **30%**.
Created machine learning pipelines for credit scoring and churn prediction using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating models into back-end services to facilitate real-time decision-making in financial contexts.

Utilized **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability and low latency across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking that improved customer satisfaction by **30%**.
Developed dynamic frontend applications with **React** (18) and **Vue 3**, enhanced with TypeScript and **Redux Toolkit**, delivering fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms that reduced load time by **25%**.
Leveraged **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast data access with a fault-tolerance rate of **99.9%** for high-traffic e-commerce workflows.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to personalize product listings and improve conversion rates, leading to a **20%** increase in sales.
Implemented **Redis** caching for product metadata and search results, significantly improving application responsiveness and reducing read pressure on databases by **40%**.
Utilized **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces for feature flags and blue-green deployments, enabling smoother rollouts and risk mitigation during major platform updates resulting in **zero downtime**.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs with **Next.js**, **Vue 3** + **Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement while ensuring WCAG 2.1 compliance.
Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, implementing tokenized transactions and ensuring PCI compliance to protect sensitive data.
Applied role-based access control (**RBAC**) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, upholding GDPR compliance and safeguarding user data throughout the platform.
